Detailed Description

Menu will be shown at the right of the ActionBar.

You can add the MenuItem to this menu via Page::onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu*) and handle clicks via Page::onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem*).

The following example demonstrates how to use the Menu

 bool Page::onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu* menu) {
     MenuItem* item = menu->add(String("title"));
     return true;
 }
See also:
MenuItem
